ud2.8:3.2: kuṇḍikāyaṃ → kuṇḍiyāyaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), kuṇḍadhānavane → kuṇḍiṭṭhānavane (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ud2.8:7.4: saha vacanā ca pana → saha vacanā pana (pts-vp-pli1ed) | saha vacanā (?)
ud2.8:11.9: pacchā tvaṃ karissasī’ti → pacchā so karissati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | karissasīti saññāpehi (mr)
ud2.8:13.3: Dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ → dvinnaṃ kho tesaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | dvinnaṃ kho nesaṃ (mr)
